``julia_help`` Get help for a julia function.

#### Description

``julia_help`` outputs the documentation of a julia function.

#### Usage
<pre><code>
julia_help(fname)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments

*  ``fname`` the name of julia function you want to get help with.

#### Examples
```{r}

## julia_setup is quite time consuming
julia_help("sqrt")
```
